nodes.text: 4A-2R was a RA-7 protocol droid droid with masculine programming and member of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang by the Clone Wars. 4A-2R was a valued part of Ohnaka's operation due to the surveillance equipment in his head.

4A-2R first appeared in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars episode "Dooku Captured." He was later identified in Star Wars: Build Your Own R2-D2 11, while Star Wars: Card Trader mistakenly identified him as 4A-R2.
